Home.fuzzWebNodeChain: Chain multiple {name} nodes together to achieve more complex logic and functionality.

Home.codecPluginCustom: Encryption, Decryption, and Encoding, with the ability to customize data processing methods via plugins.
Home.vulnBatchScan: Select the desired POCs freely for batch vulnerability detection, or choose a pre-configured group for targeted vulnerability scanning.
Home.netcardNoAccess: The current engine does not have network adapter access permissions
Home.netcardRepairWaiting: Network adapter repair takes time, please be patient.
Home.linuxMacosPermission: On Linux and macOS, you can grant full network adapter permissions to user mode by configuring permissions and groups. If repair fails, you can execute the command line manually

Home.pluginCoverageDescription: The platform includes Yak, MITM, Codec, and Port Scanning plugins, covering a wide range of scenarios such as vulnerability scanning, information gathering, CAPTCHA recognition, weak credential brute-forcing, and encryption/decryption. It also supports creating custom plugins to meet more advanced and diverse use cases.
Home.codecDesc: A data encryption and decryption tool that supports multiple encryption methods and allows users to define custom encryption and decryption workflows.
Home.payloadDesc: Supports creating, reading, updating, and deleting dictionary entries, enabling centralized and unified management.
Home.assetReconDescription: Performs asset reconnaissance through multiple tools, covering fingerprints, paths, and subdomains to facilitate deeper penetration testing.

cert.manualInstallStep1: After clicking OK, the directory containing the script will open.
cert.manualInstallStep2: Double-click the file "auto-install-cert.bat/auto-install-cert.sh" to run the installation.
cert.manualInstallStep3: If the installation is successful, you will see "Certificate successfully installed."
cert.manualInstallSafeHint: Please make sure to close any applications that may block the installation before running the script.
cert.manualInstallReadyHint: After installation is complete, you will be able to use {name} smoothly.
cert.contactForHelp: If you have any questions or need further assistance, please feel free to contact us.
cert.autoInstallPkexecHint: Hint: pkexec is missing. Install policykit (e.g. sudo apt install policykit-1) and try again.
cert.autoInstallAuthAgentHint: Hint: No authentication agent detected. Ensure a polkit authentication agent (e.g. polkit-gnome-authentication-agent-1) is running, or use manual installation.
cert.autoInstallFailedDesc: An error occurred during automatic installation:
cert.autoInstallGuideHint: You can continue via manual installation steps.
cert.mitmCertInstallPermissionNotice: Attempting to install the MITM certificate with one click. Please allow the system pop-up or antivirus permission request.
